00029 template< typename Container, typename Criteria>
00030 void erExtractCvPoints( Container &pts, IplImage *im, Criteria crit, CvRect rect=cvRect(0,0,0,0), uint delta=1)
00031 {  
00032   typedef typename Container::value_type CvPoint;
00033   int y, x;
00034   for( y = 0; y < im->height; y+=delta)
00035     { 
00036       for( x = 0; x < im->width; x+=delta)
00037         { 
00038           CvScalar a = cvGet2D( im, y, x);
00039           if( crit(a.val[0]))
00040             { 
00041               CvPoint p;
00042               p.x = x+rect.x;
00043               p.y = y+rect.y;
00044               pts.push_back(p); 
00045             }
00046         }
00047     }
00048 };

00067 {
00068   //typedef Container typeContainer;

00074   for( iterV_polyvalent = pts.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != pts.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00075     {
00076       ptsMap[iterV_polyvalent->x].push_back(*iterV_polyvalent);
00077     }
00078   pts.clear();

00081   cercle.first.x = cercle.first.x + rect.x;
00082   cercle.first.y = cercle.first.y + rect.y;
00083   cerc->centro = cercle.first;
00084   cerc->radio = cercle.second;

00093       a = abs( iterV_polyvalent->y - cercle.first.y);
00094       if( a <= cercle.second)
00095         {       
00096           if( a < b || Dmin==false)
00097             {
00098               c = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00099               Dmin = true;
00100               b = a;
00101             }
00102         }
00103     }
00104   if( Dmin)
00105     {
00106       p_polyvalent.x = iterMap->first;
00107       p_polyvalent.y = c;
00108       pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);     
00109     }
00110   else
00111     {      
00112       std::ofstream file( nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00113       file << file_name << std::endl;
00114       file << std::endl;
00115       pts.clear();
00116       return; 
00117     }

00516 template< typename Container>
00517 void erConvertPixelToMks( std::pair< double, double> factor, Container &pts, char* file_name, char* exit_name)
00518 {
00519   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00520   bool good_format;
00521   const char* num;
00522   boost::tie(good_format,num) = erGetNumberInFileName( file_name);
00523 
00524 
00525   if(good_format)
00526     {
00527       char* new_name = erConcatenateFileName( exit_name,"_data_",num,".txt");     
00528       //Ouverture du fichier
00529       std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00530       if (myfile.is_open())
00531         {
00532           //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00533           typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00534           Iterator deb=pts.begin();
00535           Iterator fin=pts.end();
00536           
00537           for(;deb!=fin;deb++)
00538             {
00539               myfile << deb->x*factor.first << "  " << deb->y*factor.second << std::endl;
00540             }     
00541           myfile.close();
00542         }
00543       else 
00544         {
00545           std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00546         }
00547     }
00548   else
00549     {
00550       std::cout << "error in format input file images";
00551     } 
00552 };

00558 template< typename Container>
00559 void erPrintCgalPoint( Container & pts, char* file_name, char* exit_name)
00560 {
00561   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00562   char* new_name = erEcrireNomFichier( file_name, exit_name, "_curveCgal_");
00563   //Ouverture du ficher
00564   std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00565   if (myfile.is_open())
00566     {
00567       //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00568       typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00569       Iterator it;      
00570       for( it = pts.begin(); it != pts.end(); it++)
00571         {         
00572           myfile << *it << std::endl;
00573         }         
00574       myfile.close();
00575     }
00576   else 
00577     {
00578       std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00579     }
00580 };

00593   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00594   char* new_name = erEcrireNomFichier( file_name, exit_name, "_curvCV_");
00595 
00596   //Ouverture du ficher
00597   std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00598   if (myfile.is_open())
00599     {
00600       //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00601       typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00602       Iterator it;      
00603       for( it = pts.begin(); it != pts.end(); it++)
00604         {         
00605           myfile << it->x << "  " << it->y << std::endl;
00606         }         
00607       myfile.close();
00608     }
00609   else 
00610     {
00611       std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00612     }
00613 };

00617 
00618 // ATTENTION Test uniquement sur y precise a quoi sert cette fonction
00619 template< typename Iterator>
00620 Iterator erFindCvPoint( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CvPoint punto)
00621 {
00622   while(p1 != p2)
00623     {
00624       //std::cout << "p1->y: " << p1->y << " " << "punto.y: " << punto.y << " " << "p1->x: " << p1->x << " " << "punto.x: " << punto.x << std::endl;
00625       if( (p1->y == punto.y) && (p1->x == punto.x))
00626         {
00627           return p1;
00628           break;
00629         }
00630       p1++;
00631     }
00632   return p2;
00633 };
